Forecast.title: Forecast
Forecast.description: The Forecast table stores information about each forecast generated for a particular goal, including the forecast date, the forecasted amount of money saved or invested for the goal by the target date, and the variance between the forecasted and target amounts. This allows the user to track how well they are progressing towards their goal and make adjustments as needed.
